input.name: accept
input.label: Only allow these file types
input.help-text: If empty: Allow any file type. Otherwise, list the media types that should be allowed to upload. Use MIME types or file endings (wild cards with asterisk are supported). Examples: application/pdf, image/*, .doc, .docx, application/msword, application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document
